Siderodromomania

Sophomania

What is the full form of the compulsion for scratching oneself?
Titillomaniac

What is the effect of a dipsomaniac in a place that serves alcohol?
A dipsomaniac would take one penalty die on all rolls unless taking a drink.

How does the Keeper handle a character who fully succumbs to a drug craving?
The Keeper may alter the level of difficulty of certain skill rolls or impose a penalty die on opposed skill rolls depending on the situation and state of the character.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill enables an insane investigator to temporarily ignore a phobia or mania?
The Psychoanalysis skill.

What is Harvey's phobia of the moon?
Selenophobia (fear of the moon).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is Harvey insane?
No, Harvey is sane at present.

What is Harvey's mental state at the beginning of the story?
sane

What triggers Harvey's decision to flee home?
underlying insanity
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Harvey's Spot Hidden roll due to his phobia?
one penalty die is applied
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When does the penalty cease?
when Harvey is safely inside doors and the moon is out of sight
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What theme is explored in the text about Harvey's situation?
the line between madness and reality
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the penalty applied to Harvey's Spot Hidden roll?
One penalty die is applied to his Spot Hidden roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what condition does the penalty cease?
When Harvey is safely in doors and the moon is out of sight.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper's role regarding the investigator's insanity?
The Keeper is free to present an investigator suffering underlying insanity with delusional sensory information at any time.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the Reality Check?
To make sure the player is sure of what their insane investigator is seeing, hearing, touching, feeling or smelling.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the significance of the moon being out of sight?
It indicates that the penalty will cease.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a Reality Check in the context of the game?
A way for the player to be sure of what their insane investigator is seeing, hearing, touching, feeling or smelling
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can trigger a Reality Check roll?
On behalf of an insane investigator, or if a player of an investigator suffering underlying insanity fails a Pushed skill roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can delusions be made more impactful?
By referring to the investigator's backstory and using an aspect as inspiration
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a great example of delusions having an impact?
When they have relevance to the investigator
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can delusions cause as consequences?
Great consequences, especially when a player of an investigator suffering underlying insanity fails a Pushed skill roll
